SELECT bi.TITLE, e.e_name, co.rent_date, CASE WHEN co.return_date IS NULL THEN '미반납' ELSE co.return_date END AS return_status FROM checkout co JOIN books b ON co.b_id = b.b_id JOIN book_info bi ON b.ISBN = bi.ISBN LEFT JOIN employees e ON co.e_id = e.e_id WHERE co.rent_date BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
